Africa Check is an independent: non-partisan organization that assesses claims made in the public arena using journalistic skills and evidence drawn from the latest online tools, readers, public sources, and experts.
The fact: checker has rated the Facebook or Instagram post as "false", "altered", "partly false", or "missing context", indicating that the claim is not authentic.
The content rated as: false" will be downgraded on Facebook and Instagram, resulting in fewer people seeing it.
Africa Check is a partner in Meta: s third-party fact-checking program, which aims to prevent the spread of false information on social media.
